statements: UPDATE transactions SET status = 'completed', processed = true WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET processed = false, delivery_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE status = 'pending' AND transaction_id = '456e89b7-e12d-3a45-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE transactions SET status = 'Pending', delivery_date = '2022-12-31', processed = false WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET processed = true, delivery_date = '2023-01-15', status = 'Completed' WHERE transaction_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9876-abcd1234efgh';
UPDATE transactions SET status = 'Completed', amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE delivery_status SET current_location = 'Warehouse', delivery_date= '2022-06-30' WHERE delivery_id = 5678;
